products.product_name: Women's adidas Originals Marathon Tech Shoes
products.description: These shoes draft off the Marathon TR	 a trail-running pioneer that debuted in 1979. The upper mixes breathable mesh and suede overlays with metallic details. A grid print on the midsole highlights the addition of responsive Boost cushioning.

products.product_name: Women's adidas Originals U_Path Run Shoes
products.description: The U_Path offers a sleek combination of retro and modern. These shoes are built of soft	 breathable mesh for everyday wear. The unique D-ring lacing system is inspired by a '70s running sneaker design. A bungee heel piece provides support	 and a lightweight EVA midsole adds all-day wearability.

products.description: Since it first hit the courts in the early '70s	 the Stan Smith has become legendary for its timeless style. These shoes pay tribute to the iconic design by preserving the low-profile cupsole and perforated 3-Stripes. The allover floral print on the upper gives this version a fresh twist.
